means: 未融（或熔）化的，未融合的，未消散的

sentence.Network_en: His shoulders were white with unmelted snow and, though it was nothing, the dampness irked him.
sentence.Network_cn: 雪粒打在身上也不容易化,他的衣肩上已积了薄薄的一层, 虽然不算什么, 可是湿渌渌的使他觉得别扭.

sentence.Network_en: On the outer rim the piles remained unmelted.
sentence.Network_cn: 站在外围的人身上的积雪都不融化.

sentence.Network_en: Many winters feature storm after storm, with a great piling up of unmelted snow.
sentence.Network_cn: 在很多冬天里,暴风雪往往是一场接着一场地袭来, 堆积起厚厚的未溶的雪.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 3. 未筛的未熔化的unmelted未筛过的unbolted

list.abs: unmelted charge的意思沪江词库精选unmelted charge是什么意思、英语短语。unmelted charge是什么意思: 未熔炉料相关短语: unmelted charge 未熔炉料.

sentences.sentence: "streets unpassable because of piles of unmelted snow"
